metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6911 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The dynamicGetbuf function in the GD Graphics Library (aka libgd) before 2.2.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via a crafted TIFF image.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6911` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgd-tools - 2.1.0-3ubuntu0.5
libgd3 - 2.1.0-3ubuntu0.5
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> php uses the system libgd2 0020-Fix-invalid-read-in-gdImageCreateFromTiffPtr.patch patch in jessie package. No sign patch is yet commited upstream.

criterions.comment: libgd2 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.0-3ubuntu0.5').
